page.title: 15OAKLEY FARM
page.content: Owned by National Trust, leased to a farmer who also farms Hatts Farm (out of this block). Acreage - 154 in all, 50 acres wheat, 50 acres winter barley 34 acres grass. No livestock. A carrier river runs through the farm from the Test, and supplies Mottisfont Abbey. Excavations are at present taking place of the Roman Road from Winchester to Exeter which passes through the farm; it crosses the Test at James's Ford (no longer useable) by the keepers' cottages at Brook. Oakley Farmhouse is let separately.
